definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
pending a decision/hanging in the balance

sentences.english: One of the lingering challenges in cognitive psychology is the evolution of language.
sentences.chinese: 认知心理学久而未决的挑战之一便是语言的进化。

sentences.english: Because commercial pattern is pendent , all jobs backwater not before.
sentences.chinese: 由于商业模式悬而未决，所有的工作都停滞不前。
一个漫长的诉讼仍悬而未决。

sentences.english: Robust Bayesian Estimate of Outstanding Claims Reserve In Non-Life Insurance;
sentences.chinese: 未决赔款准备金的估计对于保险公司而言非常重要。

sentences.english: Part III makes an investigation and evaluation on pre-sentence custody mechanism abroad.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分域外未决羁押机制的考察与评析。

sentences.english: The pending debate should be placed before a larger audience.
sentences.chinese: 那个悬而未决的问题应让更多的人来讨论。

sentences.english: Suspensive detention system is the importance part of the modern legal system.
sentences.chinese: 未决羁押制度是现代化法治建设的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: There is some conflict in the air.
Indeed, another request from Taipei is still pending.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，台北的另一项请求仍悬而未决。

sentences.english: The system displays all pending purchase requests.
sentences.chinese: 系统显示所有未决的请求。

sentences.english: Part II makes an investigation on China's status pre-sentence custody mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分我国未决羁押机制的现状考察。

sentences.english: The position of goalkeeper is moot.
sentences.chinese: 阿森纳门将位置至今悬而未决。

sentences.english: Clinton ended up carrying Illinois, then a tossup state.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿拿下了当时悬而未决的伊利诺伊州。

sentences.english: The desynchronization attack is very difficult to tackle and still an open question.
sentences.chinese: 去同步攻击很难对付，依然是一个悬而未决的课题。

sentences.english: Rigden asked. “That’s a really open question.
sentences.chinese: 里格登问道，“这确实是个悬而未决的问题。”

sentences.english: One unresolved issue is how to define a "skilled" immigrant.
sentences.chinese: 一个悬而未决的问题是如何定义“技术”移民。
